name: VSAccountManager
desc: The object that coordinates your app’s authentication requests with a TV provider’s authentication service.

items.name: var delegate: VSAccountManagerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of the account manager object.

items.name: protocol VSAccountManagerDelegate
items.desc: The methods you use to respond to authentication view controller requests.

items.name: func checkAccessStatus(options: [VSCheckAccessOption : Any], completionHandler: (VSAccountAccessStatus, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Checks your app’s access to user subscription information, and requests access if needed.

items.name: struct VSCheckAccessOption
items.desc: The options your app uses when checking access status.

items.name: enum VSAccountAccessStatus
items.desc: Constants that represent your app’s access status to the user’s subscription information.

items.name: func enqueue(VSAccountMetadataRequest, completionHandler: (VSAccountMetadata?, Error?) -> Void) -> VSAccountManagerResult
items.desc: Submits a request for subscriber account information.

items.name: class VSAccountMetadataRequest
items.desc: An object that specifies what subscriber account information your app retrieves.

items.name: class VSAccountMetadata
items.desc: A collection of information for a subscriber’s account.

items.name: class VSAccountManagerResult
items.desc: An object that represents a request made for subscriber account information.

items.name: class VSAccountProviderResponse
items.desc: An object that contains the response from the account provider.

items.name: struct VSAccountProviderAuthenticationScheme
items.desc: Authentication schemes for account provider requests and responses.

items.name: let VSOpenTVProviderSettingsURLString: String
items.desc: A URL string you use to deep link to the system’s TV Provider settings.
